fallacies.description: Post Hoc: Temporal correlation does not imply causation. Need mechanism.
fallacies.matched_text: after we deployed the update, the server crashed. therefore the update cause
fallacies.context: After we deployed the update, the server crashed. Therefore the update caused the crash.

fallacies.description: Circular Reasoning: Conclusion appears in premise. Need independent evidence.
fallacies.matched_text: correct because the implementation is correct
fallacies.context: The code is correct because the implementation is correct.

fallacies.description: False Dichotomy: May be oversimplifying to two options. Are there alternatives?
fallacies.matched_text: either we use microservices or the system will fail. there are only two choice
fallacies.context: Either we use microservices or the system will fail. There are only two choices.

fallacies.description: Hasty Generalization: Universal claim from limited sample. Need N≥3 examples.

fallacies.description: False Certainty: Absolute claims without verification. Need probabilistic language.

fallacies.context: This will definitely work. The implementation is obviously correct.
